steps.description: To start, fancifully substitute the character b at slot 5 with the glyph p at slot 2.
Quickly switch the character l at 6 with the symbol r at location 3.
Smoothly interchange the character e at slot 7 with the glyph o at 4.
Curiously trade the glyph m at 8 with the p at slot 5.
At this point, smoothly interchange the glyph e at 4 with the character l at position 3.
Cautiously trade the letter b at location 2 with the glyph b at slot 2.
Carefully exchange the letter  at position 1 with the symbol a at location 0.
Carefully swap the letter o at index 7 with the r at location 6.
To end, fancifully substitute the p at location 8 with the glyph r at position 7.
